==How to read this guide==

If you are trying to learn JGF, please visit the [GettingStarted Getting Started] guide!

This guide is not a tutorial. It covers particular topics shall you wish to learn more about a particular subject.

==The directory==

JGF components need to talk to each other. Because JGF is a loosely coupled system, components need to be provided with references to the other components they collaborate with.
